attributes.action: Allow the whole of the UK to vote on Scottish Independence
attributes.additional_details:
At a time where in Scotland there is masses of debates ongoing as to weather or not Scotland would be better off Independent from the Union it is unfair and undemocratic that it is only Scottish residents that get to have a say. Self determination does not just give Scotts the right to decide but also conveys that right to the rest of the UK population.

The Westminster government should allow all of its citizens a vote on independence not just those living inside Scotland, at the same time as the Scottish vote in the Autumn of 2014.
